original_query: SELECT MIN(b.Id) FROM badges as b, posts as p WHERE b.UserId = p.OwnerUserId AND b.Date<=CAST('2014-09-11 08:55:52' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.AnswerCount>=0 AND p.AnswerCount<=4 AND p.CommentCount>=0 AND p.CommentCount<=17
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE badges.Date <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-11 08:55:52'

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE CAST(posts.AnswerCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.AnswerCount AS INTEGER) <= 4 AND (CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) <= 17)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1.UserId=E2.OwnerUserId)
